data.title: Transform!
data.statement:
(problem is from Codeforces 523A, VK Cup 2015)

You will be given an image of width [[w]] and height [[h]].

For this problem, rotate the image 90 degrees clockwise, then flip the image horizontally, then finally zoom in twice into the image.

data.stubGenerator:
read w:int h:int
loop h read string:string(w)
write transformed output
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> Two space-separated integers, [[w]] and [[h]] — the width and height of the image, respectively.
<<Next [[h]] lines:>> A string of size [[w]]
data.outputDescription: Print the input with [[w]] width and [[h]] height after going through the transformations, ending up with [[2h]] width and [[2w]] height.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

(problem is from Codeforces 523A, VK Cup 2015)

You will be given an image of width w and height h.

For this problem, rotate the image 90 degrees clockwise, then flip the image horizontally, then finally zoom in twice into the image.
Input
Line 1 : Two space-separated integers, w and h — the width and height of the image, respectively.
Next h lines: A string of size w
Output
Print the input with w width and h height after going through the transformations, ending up with 2h width and 2w height.
Constraints
1 ≤ w, h ≤ 100
Example
Input
3 2
123
456
Output
1144
1144
2255
2255
3366
3366
